name: Scarlet of the City of Devils - Demo
name_original: Scarlet of the City of Devils - Demo
description:
If browser version is not up to par try downloading the PC/Mac version.

Please Comment below, feedback for this game will be very helpful.

The Demo holds 4 bosses and 3 demon skills to find. More content will come in time.

Dev Shadmare.
